backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles and game stats with access control for users and admins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI replacement tasks to involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference list summarizing major frontend files, their responsibilities, and gameplay/UI roles.
frontend/docs/IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md: High-level implementation guide describing project structure and overall IC-powered game architecture.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH variable definitions for themes, neon colors, and global UI tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing menu/playing states, high score loading/saving, and theme setup.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button managing authentication state and clearing React Query cache.
frontend/src/game/controls/Joystick.tsx: Touch joystick with drag handling, movement normalization, and full lifecycle/reset event listeners.
frontend/src/game/controls/ShootButton.t: A touch and mouse-enabled shoot button that triggers start and end shooting events with visual neon styling.
frontend/src/game/controls/useCombinedCo: Merges keyboard, joystick, and touch shooting into one control state, preferring the stronger movement input.
frontend/src/game/controls/useKeyboardCo: Tracks WASD, arrow keys, and spacebar to produce movement and shooting control values.
frontend/src/game/persistence/useSavedSt: Loads and saves player game stats through an actor, using React Query for caching and mutations.
frontend/src/game/render/GameCanvas.tsx: Renders the game state to a full-screen canvas, including the player ship, bullets, and effects with neon visuals.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for all game entities and the overall game state.
frontend/src/game/ui/Hud.tsx: Displays score, level, progress bar, pause controls, and level-complete overlays.
frontend/src/game/ui/TouchControlsDebugO: Shows debug info for touch detection, forced controls, and pause state.
frontend/src/game/useGameEngine.ts: Runs the main game loop, updating player movement, shooting, enemies, levels, and game state progression.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the userâ€™s identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDynamicViewport.ts: Tracks visualViewport changes and updates a CSS variable for consistent dynamic viewport height on mobile.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing; game-specific queries are defined elsewhere.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables, dynamic viewport utilities, and UI effect classes for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/screens/GameScreen.tsx: Implements the gameplay UI including canvas, HUD, controls, dialogs, and integrates dynamic viewport handling.
frontend/src/screens/MenuScreen.tsx: Renders the main menu with background, high score display, control instructions, start button, and login option.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom neon color palette, container settings, and custom animations/plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing game goals, architecture notes, known UI issues, and existing implemented features for a neon-styled React space shooter.
